feed.title: Geonil Yun
feed.subtitle: A minimal, portfolio, sidebar, bootstrap Jekyll theme with responsive web design and focuses on text presentation.

entry.title: Markdown 사용법
entry.summary: 1. markdown 이란 markdown은 텍스트 기반의 마크업 언어(markup language) 이다. ddd 2. 마크다운 문법 2.1 헤더 (Headers) 글머리(Headers)는 1 ~ 6 까지 지원한다. # This is a H1 ## This is a H2 ### This is a H3 #### This is a H4 ##### This is a H5 ###### THis is a H 6 ####### This is not working 사용 This is a H1 This is a H2 This is a H3 This is a H4 This is a H5 THi...
